spoilers.question: What is the year before 1 AD called?
The word 'alphabet' comes from the word 'alpha' and what other one?
Story Spoier
spoilers.answer: Strength Rank 4 is needed to unlock the Sun Social link

0419.dayNotes: Today you can join a Sports club. You can choose either Soccer or Basketball, and it will affect their respective social links.

spoilers.question: How many parts are there in Murakami's 'The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle'?

0420.dayNotes: Starting today, you can also buy books at Yomenaido Bookstore at the South Central Shopping District.

spoilers.question: What was the first economic bubble incident in the world?

0423.dayNotes: You can now accept part time jobs from the job board

0424.dayNotes: Kou will call you today to hang out.

spoilers.question: What's it called when you gain more muscle after getting sore through excercise?

0425.dayNotes:
Quest 1 and 2 are available today.
Today you can join a cultural club, Drama or Music. Like the Sports club, this choice will affect the Sun social link.
0425.nightNotes:
Boxed Lunch:
Ginger Pork (Yosuke and Chie like this) - Score it with a knife

spoilers.question: Which of these types of numbers does not exist?
story spoiler
spoilers.answer: Last day to save Yukiko or GAME OVER

spoilers.question: What is the greatest canyon in the solar system?

0501.nightNotes: You can check the fridge for a Courage increase today.

0502.dayNotes:
Quest 4, 5, and 6 are available today.
You can also study with Yosuke or Chie to boost your Knowledge and gain some relationship points.
0502.nightNotes: You can check the fridge for a Courage increase today.

0503.dayNotes: Justice Social Link unlocks today. Hierophant and Justice social links seem to be mutually exclusive, so if you complete dungeons quickly - and Dojima gets his days off. This guide is written while having cleared dungeons on the first day possible, so there may be instances where the Hierophant arcana is listed, but the Justice arcana is available instead.

0504.dayNotes: You are invited by Yosuke to hang out.

0505.dayNotes: Hermit social link unlocks automatically today. This link advances by completing quests, which take time when you turn them in, but NOT when you accept them. Unlike many other social links, the hermit link can be advanced on ANY day, so I won't list it with the Social Links except for on rainy days when there are few if any other options
0505.nightNotes: You can check your fridge for a Courage increase today.

0506.dayNotes:
There are new books for sale at Yomenaido Bookstore.
Quest 7 is available today.
Starting today you can spend time to draw fortunes at the shrine for a random amount of relationship points
0506.nightNotes: You can talk to Dojima at home to start the Hierophant Social Link, which you can only work on it at night.

spoilers.question: Do you know how Soseki Natsume translated the English phrase 'I love you' into Japanese?
spoilers.answer: The moon is beautiful, isn't it?

spoilers.question: What is it called when muscles grow after excercise?
What is the year before 1 A.D. called?
Which of these types of numbers does not exist?
Who translated 'I love you' as 'The moon is beautiful, isn't it'?
Who said 'As soon as laws are necessary for men, they are no longer fit for freedom?'
Which of the following is the highest mountain in the solar system?

0512.dayNotes:
Dojima will tell you about Adachi hanging out around Junes. You can now find Adachi at Junes occasionally.
If you go to the Velvet Room today you'll see one of Marie's poems.
0512.nightNotes:
Boxed Lunch:
Meat Stew - Simmer with a drop lid

spoilers.question: Story Spoiler
spoilers.answer: Time is limited on the Jester social link, so plan appropriately

0517.dayNotes: Priestess social link unlocks automatically today

0518.dayNotes: Another one of Marie's poems can be found today if you go to the Velvet Room.

0519.dayNotes:
Empress Social Link unlocks starting today in the velvet room with Knowledge Expert
Quest 17 is available today.As this SL takes no time to advence, and can even technically be completed in a single day, it won't be listed under Social Links for other days
0519.nightNotes:
Test results are out today. Rewards
Highest Score
3 Chest Keys from Ms. Sofue
Portrait Medal from Nanako
30000 Yen from Dojima
Top 10
3 Chest Keys from Ms. Sofue
20000 Yen from Dojima

0520.dayNotes:
New books are available at Yomenaido Bookstore today.
Quest 16 is available today.

0522.nightNotes: Gardening unlocks today. Plants take time to grow, but take no time to plant or harvest. You can also maintain the plants to speed up the growth rate, or if there is only one day left to harvest, increase the number of plants you get from growing. Doing so grants points for Nanako or Dojima if they join you.

0524.dayNotes: If you did well on the exam, you can check your shoe locker (1st floor, near the exit) to find something inside.
0524.nightNotes:
Boxed Lunch:
Sweet and Sour Pork. (Chie likes this) - Use potato starch

spoilers.question: Story Spoiler
spoilers.answer: Tower Social Link is progressed through the Tutor Job

spoilers.question: Story Spoiler
spoilers.answer: Devil Social Link is progressed through the Janitor job

spoilers.question: Story Spoiler
spoilers.answer: Death social link unlocks after rank 4 of the Devil social link

0525.dayNotes:
New part-time jobs are available today.
Take as many jobs as you can; there's no penalty in taking multiple jobs and is the only way you can get all Social Links anyway.

spoilers.question: Tell me how the theory that the pyramids were built by slaves was disproven!

0526.nightNotes: If you come home today and have the tutor/hospital cleaner/dish-washer jobs, you can tell Dojima about it.  Keep picking options, and eventually you should be able to go out at night whenever you want, whether or not Dojima is there. Very handy for making more progress in your Social Links.

spoilers.question: Story Spoiler
spoilers.answer: Hanging out with Kou and answering 'thanks' when prompted gets you the Witch Detective book

0529.dayNotes:
Kou will ask you to hang out today.
Starting today, you can order from the Shopping Channel. If you forget or are unable to watch the Shopping Program on Sunday, you can now watch on Monday and/or Tuesday to catch those deals that you might have missed.
0529.nightNotes:
Shopping Program:
1 Adios Shoes and 2 Slimming Foods for 5,980 Yen
1 Medical Kit and 4 Medicines for 2,980 Yen

0531.dayNotes: You can check your shoe locker today for an item if you did well on your exams.
0531.nightNotes:

Yakiniku Bento. (Chie likes this) - Use soy sauce instead

You can increase your Courage by checking the fridge today.
If you talk to Dojima today, you'll get the option of going to Junes and picking up an item.

Quest 21, 29, and 30 are available today.
Quest 22 will appear as soon as Quest 21 is finished.

0610.dayNotes: Starting today, you can spend days exploring with your new scooter. It will take 3 rides to unlock a new location

spoilers.question: The word 'alphabet' comes from the words 'alpha' and what other one?
How was the theory that the pyramids were built by slaves disproven?
What drink name means 'bury demons'?
What is the medical term for brainfreeze
What is the Japanese zodiac equivalent to the 'cat' in the Thai and Vietnamese zodiacs?
What vegetable was used to make the first jack-o'-lanterns?
What color were the pyramids when they were first built?
What gets mixed with snow in Europe that sometimes causes it to turn red?
Story Spoiler
spoilers.answer: Only accessible if you maxed out Marie's social link before she left

spoilers.question: Story Spoiler
spoilers.answer: Say NO to returning home and instead go to the Junes food court for TRUE ENDING

fool.name: Investigation Group
fool.notes: The Fool Social Link progresses automatically as you complete the story
rank: Automatic upon clearing Yukiko's Castle

magician.name: Yosuke Hanamura
rank: Automatic on April 16th

dialog.question: Yosuke: Sorry about that. You know me, i'm infamous around here.
Yosuke: Wait a minute... Am I starting to sound like Teddie?
Yosuke: Looks like someone got my address. I get a lot of spam.
Yosuke: Phew, i'm beat... i am not the complaints department...
Yosuke:I have to do what i can...
Yosuke: So...? You keep the goods under your futon?
Yosuke: So, you ever invited a girl in here?
Yosuke: But hey, I'm glad you were there! Thanks.
Yosuke: So... there's no need to bother with outsiders.
They started to badmouth Saki-senpai
Yosuke: I just blurted out a buncha crap, huh?
Yosuke: But then...
Yosuke I'm sorry... Saki-senpai. I'm sorry... Main Character.
Main Character... I think i'm all cried out... (Only Available if you pick the Pick the 3rd Choice then the 1st Choice on the Rank 6 to 7)
Yosuke is smiling sadly...
answers: Be a man. Stand up straight.

dialog.question: Yosuke: Just being born, living your life... Before you know it, you're already special to someone.
Yosuke: I like you for that, and I'm proud of you... But  I guess I was jealous at the same time.
Will hitting Yousuke make you and him equal...?

priestess.name: Yukiko Amagi
rank: Automatic on May 17th

dialog.question: Yukiko: Sensei recommended this book to me because it has details on a bunch of different job licenses...
Yukiko: I was thinking something along the lines of an interior decorator... what you think?
Yukiko: Even eggs come in so many varieties...
Yukiko: So i'm going to get some practice while i can!
Yukiko: W-Will...you?
For some reason, an unusually pungent smell hangs in the air.
Yukiko looks sad...
Yukiko: Umm ... I'm sorry to drag you around...
Yukiko: Then the furniture department. I want to look at the desk. Those and the lamps...
Yukiko:  Those people are from some TV station. They wanted to cover the Amagi Inn.
Yukiko: ...I'd feel better about leaving.
Yukiko: I wrote down everything I need, so this shouldn't take that long.
Yukiko: But it's not turning out quite like it does in the book, even though I'm following the directions.
Yukiko: Are they that worried about my cooking...?
Yukiko: Once I leave this town... I won't be able to come here again,will I...?
Yukiko: They all have the wrong idea... I'm really sorry...
Yukiko: I'm sorry, I have to go.
answers: You're going to be on TV?

dialog.question: Yukiko: W-Was I scary?
Yukiko: Are you going to wish for something, Main Character-kun?
Yukiko: I-is it okay... for me to ask...?
Yukiko: Umm, sorry... I don't know what to talk about...
Yukiko: That's why... I'm going to stay here. By my own will.
Yukiko: It's a charm from that shrine... To protect you.
Yukiko: That's why... I'm going to stay here. By my own will.
Yukiko: It's the charm from that shrine... To protect you. well.

empress.name: Margaret
rank: Starting from May 19, enter the Velvet Room to access the Empress's Social Link. (Level 3 Knowledge is required)

rank.notes: Make a Ippon-datara (Hermit) with the Skill Sukukaja
Make a Matador (Death) with the Skill Mahama
Make a Gdon (Sun) with the Skill Rampage
Make a Neko-shogun(Star) with the skill Bufula
Make a Black Frost(Fool) with the skill Auto-Sukukaja
Make a Yatagarusu(Sun) with the skill Megido
Make a Yatsufusa(Hanged-Man) with the skill Mediarama
Make a Ganesha(Star) with the skill Tetrakam
Make a Trumpeter(Judgement) with the skill Mind Charge

emperor.name: Kanji Tatsumi
rank: Starting from June 9th, go to the school, on Learning Building 2F, there's a female student located near the middle Staircase. She'll mention about Kanji Threatening people. After you have spoken to her. Go find Kanji at Practice Building 1F. Speak to him and pick the first choice 'Yes I do.' to activate the Social Link.

dialog.question: Kanji: She's always apologizing for me. She's been sprouting more and more white hairs...
Kanji: ... ...
Kanji: Sorry. Looks like it was no big deal..
Kanji's Mother: He's always had trouble getting along with people. He didn't have any friends like you before.
Kanji: Ughh... When you met Ma at the Hospital... She say anything about me?
Kanji: Oh, uhh... I'm gonna go now.
Kanji: Oh... Anyways, sorry 'bout dragging you into this...
answers: Too bad that you didn't find it
you're giving him a new one?

dialog.question: Kanji: Er...
answers: This old man here made it.

dialog.question: Kanji: Hah, he said I'm cool...
Kanji: Strange situation I got myself into, ain't it?
Kanji: That okay with you 'big bro'?
Kanji: There's something else I gotta confront too, ain't there?
Police Officer: ... Come with me.
Police Officer: Hmph, so you admit it. Not a shread of remorse, either.
Police Officer: What a load of... There's no way you're getting me to believe that.
Kanji: Its the first time I went on my own... Well, I had a lot to tell him.
Kanji: As long as there's someone like that snot-nosed kid to accept me, I ain't afraid of nothing!

hierophant.name: Ryotaro Dojima
hierophant.notes: Dojima's social link advances at night, and his availability is determined by the current dungeon. If it's finished, Dojima gets his
rank: Talk to Dojima starting from May 6th.

dialog.question: Dojima: So... What have you been doing after school?
Dojima: But its not as if we have much in common... except for the murders.
Dojima: You're more like a very young brother to me then a son.
answers: Should i call you big bro?

dialog.question: Dojima: When is always, huh...?
Dojima: Plus... I'm not fit to be her family.
Dojima: All we've got is instant, though. How do you take it?
Dojima: Go watch TV with Nanako. I'll bring it to you when it's ready.
answers: You don't have to do that.

dialog.question: Dojima: Oh...Sorry, I wasn't talking about you.
Dojima: Its Late. Go to Sleep
Dojima: Let's stop there.
Dojima: I don't need a private life to do that. ...Nanako will understand.
Dojima: I can do that anytime.
Dojima: Sorry, but my hands are full here.
Dojima: Do you understand why?
answers: Because you're a coward.(LV 5 Courage Required)

dialog.question: Dojima: Er... Sorry about making you go along with this today.
Dojima: That's why I used revenge as an excuse to spend time away from her...
Dojima: This is your personal mug. Write your name on it later.
Dojima: Main Character, take care of Nanako.

lovers.name: Rise Kujikawa
rank: Automatic on July 23rd

dialog.question: Rise: But it's a little embarrassing to show up alone, you know?
Rise: It'll take time to get back, so let's walk around quick!
Rise is worried...
Rise looks desperate...
Rise: I'm sorry...  Lying about marrying you and all...
Rise: Senpai, have you ever thought that you're pushing yourself too far, or that you were just acting...?
Rise: You're with me right now because i am Risette, yeah?
Inoue: A fan letter came, you see...
Rise: To think i trusted him... I feel betrayed!
Rise: I gave up on being Risette. I can't meet her expectations...
Rise: Doesn't that sound fun? H-How about it? Haha...Ha...
Rise: ... She was cute, so i figured she would sell.
Rise: You like having such a cute underclassman, right? I'm an ex-idol, after all.
Rise looks helpless...
Rise: Senpai... I... I don't know why I'm crying...
...You sense this is an important moment. There's no turning back.
Rise: And yet... I felt so angry about it... Why do you think that is?

chariot.name: Chie Satonaka
rank: Automatic on April 18th

dialog.question: Chie: Still, now's the time to train right?
Chie: ...no?
Chie: But me, I totally lose it. kinda funny, huh?
Chie: W-Well...
answers: Quit bagging on her(Requires LV 3 Courage)

dialog.question: What Should you do?
Chie: Mmmm... The meat and rice just flow through my veins...
Chie: I hope she's not straining herself. Makes you worry, huh?
Chie: What cowards, ganging up on the weak like that!
Chie: We'll grab'em and make them apologize! Right, Leader?
Things aren't looking good...
Chie: I charged in by myself and caused you trouble
Chie: I feel like I missed the point...
Things aren't looking good...
Chie: ...Was that stupid of me?
What to do?
answers: Will you be my girlfriend? (Lovers Relationship)

dialog.question: Chie: Oh w-well, how did the room you had back home look?
Chie: I was thinking... maybe both of us together...
What should you do?
Chie: Wh-What am I saying...?
Chie: We are always teammates, that's it!
answers: We can be more than that.

justice.name: Nanako Dojima
justice.notes: Nanako's schedule is determined on whether you finish the dungeon or not. Whenever you have Dojima around, you cannot access Nanako's Social link
rank: Automatic on May 3rd.

dialog.question: Nanako is fidgeting.
Nanako: Are you an only child?
Nanako: Hmmm... Then do you have a little sister? (If you pick the 2nd choice from the last question)
Nanako: Dad'll be disappointed.
Nanako looks sad.
answers: It's not Nanako's fault. (Required Lv 3 Expression) +3

dialog.question: Nanako is nodding her head cheerfully.
Nanako: What happens to a person when they die?
Nanako: Why do bad people do bad things?
Nanako: Are bad people more important to Dad than I am?
Nanako: What do they mean by "real"?
answers: A person you love a lot.

dialog.question: Nanako: Daddy doesn't come home because I'm not his "real" daughter?
What should you do?
answers: Listen to her talk.(Requires Lv3 Understanding) +3

dialog.question: Nanako looks likes she's about to cry...
Nanako: He can't come, huh?
Ryoutarou: What's gotten into her...?
Ryoutarou: She'll listen to you...
Nanako: Big bro...
Nanako: Is he going to throw me away, too...?
Nanako: What should I do...? The Teacher is will yell at me.
answers: I'll help you look for it.

dialog.question: Nanako: Why did Dad stop smiling...?
Nanako: Big bro... I love my Dad.
Nanako: ...I feel sorry for him, losing someone he loves.
answers: I feel sorry for you too.

dialog.question: What would you do?
Nanako: Big Bro, can you make me a salad?
Nanako: You're my family, too, so... Let's work hard together!

hermit.name: Fox
hermit.notes: The Hermit Social Link progresses through the completion of ema requests. Accepting quests takes no time, but turning them in does. The Fox is available any day you can reach the shrine.
rank: Cleared Quest 7, Automatic on May 5th

fortune.name: Naoto Shirogane
rank: Starting from October 21, First talk to Naoto, then go to Shopping District , North and find the man in a black (Near Aiya). Talk to him and pick the first choice. (You must have Maxed Knowledge). Go back to the school and find Naoto, you must have maxed courage to start the Social Link.

dialog.question: Naoto: I'd chalk it up as a prank.
Naoto: ......
answers: You don't need to go home?
A thief in a sleuth's house?

dialog.question: Naoto: I don't know about those, but my belongings aren't of any particular value, so...
Naoto is Holding a sealed letter...
Naoto: How misleading... A sealed letter at a time like this...
answers: What if it's from a guy?

dialog.question: Naoto is holding a card.
answers: Is it a guy this time?

dialog.question: Naoto: I haven't the time to waste on this...
Naoto: But... to ignore it only makes me angry!
Naoto: *sigh* What should I do...?
Naoto: "Eating letters with a red face"...? This is...
Naoto: Grampa had this? Why did he keep it...?
Naoto: I, er... I think I'll let this play out... And, umm, if possible...
Naoto: Why you, though...?
Naoto: When the bank close, the fruit tree grows. By the large seven at the third is the spot I chose...
Naoto: ......
answers: I'm glad you're a girl.(Lovers Flag 1)

dialog.question: Naoto: Perhaps the "minus" part is important...
Naoto: I feel that... I'm undergoing a change.
Naoto: We may be able to catch him in the act.
The Man brandished a Knife.
Naoto: Why...!? (This Question only will appear if you pick the first choice of the previous question.)
Naoto: A place I'd be fond of...?
Naoto: Next, what I "can't stand" to do. There are several possibilities,
Naoto: Judging by the position of your TV, you regularly watch the Midnight
Naoto: D-Do you find the pitch of my voice strange?
answers: I like it higher. (Naoto will dress as a girl for Christmas Event.)

dialog.question: Naoto: What about you?
answers: I was about to give up.

dialog.question: Naoto: Now you're my assistant!

strength.name: Sports Club
rank: Starting from April 19, visit the head office and speak to King Moron. This will give you the option to join the Basketball Club (Kou) or the Soccer Club (Daisuke).

dialog.question: Kou: Hey Main Character, Aiya or Junes? You decide.
Kou: Well, I do like me some sweets...
Kou: You like sweets, Main Character? Want me to get you some, too?
Daisuke: ...I want you to help him out
Daisuke: She calls it "barbaric."
Daisuke: So... I want you to help him out.
Kou: Just the other day I was greeting people at one of those high society gatherings. Can you imagine? Me at one of those things?
Kou tries to sound cheerful...
Kou: Hey. Practive over already?
Kou: But me, I'm feeling like I've sunk to the bottom of
Daisuke: Hey, Main Character, what's his problem? Is he sick or something?
Daisuke: Right?
Daisuke: I got some dirt on a bunch of other guys too, so we should have no problem getting together a full team.
Kou: Should I just leave?
Kou: Yeah, the orphanage.
Kou: I was thinking maybe I'd ask about my real parents.
Daisuke: I'm kinda worried...
Kou: What are you two doing here?
Kou: I have no one...
Kou: And now that I don't have to wear that mask anymore... I guess
Kou: ...What do you think?
Kou: How 'bout you? Wanna go for a dip?
Kou: Studying, lessons, and all that crap... I think I'm gonna keep doing it all.
Daisuke: D-Dude... We can't take this...!
Soccer Player: Hey "Main Character". Tear down the goals and clean up before you leave, alright?
Daisuke: Still, it went pretty fast with three people.
answers: I didn't ask you to do it.

dialog.question: Daisuke: Whatever...Girls are a pain in the ass, right, Main Character?
Kou is also beaming like it's all thanks to him...
Kou: I have to do some family stuff today, though. Would next time be okay?
answers: Anything for you guys. (Requires LV4 Understanding)
Long as it's not a hassle.

dialog.question: Daisuke: I have to do the class record today so don't want to wait for me.
Kou: Tell you what, we'll talk over mapo rice. My treat!
Kou: You think it could be related...?
Kou: What do you think?
Kou is looking at you expectantly...
Their quarrel starts to escalate...
Daisuke: You got that!? It's MY life! you guys have nothing to do with it.
Kou: You can be pretty sincere when you want to, Daisuke.
I wonder if she's as stuck in the past as I am...

rank.notes: All Choices have the same effect.

hangedman.name: Naoki Konishi
rank: Starting from June 8th , you'll see a cutscene with Naoki for the first time. After this event , you can find him at the first floor in the learning Building. Speak with Naoki 3 times to activate his Social Link.

dialog.question: Naoki:
Naoki: I mean... what exactly is an "admirable life." anyway?
Naoki is laughing like he's having a good time...
answers: Ask him to tell another story.
Tell your own tale of failure.

dialog.question: Naoki is biting his lip...
Naoki looks distressed...
answers: Talk back to the lady. (Requires Lv4 Courage)

dialog.question: Naoki: I'm sorry... It's a little awkward to be around me, huh?
Naoki: ... ...
Naoki: ... I have to do it.
Naoki: They got all suspicious of me suddenly. I wasn't expecting
Naoki: Am i really that pitiable...?
Naoki: I wanted to apologize for that.
Naoki: How do I get out from that...? What would be best for me, for Sis...? I just don't know.
Naoki: Ironic isn't it...?
Naoki: Yosuke-san sure is nosy. Oh wait, so are you...
answers: Don't lump me in with him.

dialog.question: Naoki: Because I wasn't able to cry like the actors on TV. I thought
Naoki: She must've wanted to live more, huh?
answers: Yeah, I am sure of it.

dialog.question: Naoki: Naoki is biting his lip...
answers: It was out of your hand.
Just let it all out, Naoki.(Requires LV 5 Understanding)

dialog.question: Naoki: Its all thanks to you.

death.name: Hisano Kuroda
rank: When you reach Devil's Social Link up to rank 4, you'll see an event with Hisano. After this, you can find her at the Flood Plain on Sundays (Or Holidays) talk to her to start the Social Link.

dialog.question: Hisano: Haha, he was a handsome man.
answers: So he didn't look like me?

dialog.question: Hisano:Do i look like Death to you?
Hisano: Watching the river here with you, like this brings back memories...
Hisano: ...I was happy back then.
Hisano: He went to Heaven... and i will surely go to Hell.
Hisano: My husband's tsuki meinichi is today, and I've just come back from visiting his grave.
Hisano: For those trying to reach the gods, and to the families of those people, death can be an ally.
Hisano: You don't quite understand it yet, do you?
Hisano: It must be boring, listening to this old bag's stories...
Hisano: Enough about me. I want to hear something from you. Tell me anything.
Hisano: But... I do not want to see you anymore.
answers: But I want to see you.

dialog.question: Hisano: Being noncommittal... floating around, never deciding to be one thing nor another. Can a man understand that?
Hisano: But I wanted to write my reply so badly, so I would grow impatient and read it carefully, over and over.

rank.notes: If you want to trigger the next rank in the Social Link, you have to talk to the Old Man Daidara (Weapon Shop) (Select the Talk command) and get Husband's Letter.

dialog.question: What should you do?
Hisano: I'm sure he never imagined that the 'Hisa-san' he loved would some day wish to see him dead...
Hisano: That was his punishment. Punishment for forgetting me...
Hisano: I must accept that...
Hisano: I didn't want to accept that he had died all by himself, not remembering me, leaving me behind...
Hisano: Haha... But it's too late now, isn't it?
Hisano: At first, I turned them down because I didn't want to leave the place I was born in, but...
Hisano: I'd feel that... our story hasn't truly ended...
Hisano: ...Do you have someone you love?

temperance.name: Eri Minami
rank: Starting from May 2nd, go to Shopping District North and look for the bulletin board. Apply for the Assistant daycare caretaker Job. When the Job is available, go to Shopping District South and examine the Bus Stop to reach to the Daycare Job. You must take the job twice before the Social Link starts.

dialog.question: Eri: E..Do you like children
Eri: I don't hate him, but...
Eri: I guess he wants to see his father.
Eri: *sigh* He's so inconsiderate...
Eri: I should have known better than to try. We're not related, so there's nothing I can do about it
Eri: Doesn't that make you feel better? Isn't that a wonderful idea?
Eri: Honestly, though... I just want to go back to the city.
Eri: Please, don't tell Yuu-kun... Or the other mothers.
Yuuta: ...Is she mad at me?
Yuuta: ......
Yuuta: ...I've never seen Phoenix Ranger Featherman R.
Yuuta: ...She's always watching TV.
answers: She won't let you watch it?
Have you asked to watch it?

dialog.question: Eri: *huff* *huff* I'm sorry I'm late...
Eri: I don't know what a child wants...
Yuuta: You told her I liked Phoenix Ranger Featherman R, huh?
Yuuta: I-In return for her gift!?
Eri: I wonder if he's afraid of me.
Eri: He must hate the fact I'm here.
Ms. Nakamura: Oh, who is this? He seems a bit young to be your husband.
Eri: If only... If only he was a more studious child...
Eri: I'm sorry about the other day. Were you hurt?
Yuuta: ...Sor...ry...
Eri: He's actually a sweet boy...
Eri: ...What took me so long, huh?
Eri: So, today's the last day he'll be here. When Yuuta's done with school, we'll spend time together at the house.

devil.name: Sayoko Uehara
rank: Starting from May 25, Apply for the Hospital Janitor Job. Go to the Cleaning part time job twice. (Requires Lv3 Diligence)

dialog.question: Sayoko: Would you like to study with me? Perhaps a subject that they don't teach in school, if you catch my drift...?
Sayoko: ... So why are you working at a job like this?
Sayoko: Speaking of which... Say, do you have a girlfriend?
Sayoko: ... Do you see what i'm getting at?
Old lady in black: Do you work here?
Old lady in black: But i won't be coming back here anymore...
Sayoko: ... Don't ask what happened here.
Sayoko: They only need me when they're my patients... in the end, they all leave me.
Sayoko: That was the first time anyone ever called me a 'Slutty bitch'
Sayoko: *sigh* The other nurse were just watching with these stupid smirks on their faces.
Sayoko: What am I living for...?
Sayoko isn't saying anything...
Sayoko: What am I doing...?
Sayoko seems to be tormenting herself.
Sayoko looks a bit pale. She also seems to be very tired.
Middle-aged nurse: We're going to be needing this room, so can you get all your cleaning supplies out of here?
Sayoko: I was just a little wobbly...
What should you do...?
Sayoko: Otherwise... I'd never be able to face him again...
Sayoko: I wanted to say goodbye.

tower.name: Shu Nakajima
rank: Starting from May 25, Apply for the Tutor Job. (Requires Lv5 Understanding)

dialog.question: Shu: ...If I get into a good college... Am i really 'Set'?
Shu: ...Do you know what that means?
Shu: Huh... Time's already up. We were still in the middle of that last question...
answers: I'll stay and help you. (Requires LV 5 Diligence)

dialog.question: Shu: What do you think of your school?
Shu: ... They don't get what it means to learn at all.
Shu: That Place...
answers: You're not the only one. (Courage UP)

dialog.question: Shu: Is there any bullying at your school?
Shu: Maybe that's not the same thing as bullying.
Shu: It seems that I've been talking to you about things that really aren't relevant to my studies...
Shu: *Sigh*
answers: Were they a pain in the ass?

dialog.question: Shu: ... They're all stupid.
Shu: Um... You only come here because you're being paid to, right?
Shu: ... I wish I was a genius.
answers: Work hard, and you can be.

dialog.question: Shu: Let's change the subject to something else, What's up?
answers: The other day at school...(Expression UP)
The other day at school...(Expression UP)
What I like in a girl is...(Courage UP)

rank.notes: The next time you visit Tower, you automatically will go home instead.

dialog.question: Shu: Is it possible for anyone to be all those things? Do you know anyone like that?
Shu: ...Every time I have that dream, the person gets one car closer to me
Shu suddenly looks tormented
answers: Ask him, what he's worried about.

dialog.question: Shu: Today...is my birthday, I forgot...
Shuu looks sad...
First, you need...
Shuu begins to sob...
answers: Wait for him to calm down.

dialog.question: Shu begins to cry again.
Thank you for recognizing... 'me.'' I wouldn't have been able to talk to Mom if you hadn't.

star.name: Teddie
star.notes: The Star Social Link levels up automatically as you progress through the story
rank: Automatic on June 24th

moon.name: Ai Ebihara
moon.notes: You`ll have to be careful with Ai, because picking the wrong choices can instantly bring her to Reverse.
rank: Attend the Strength Social Link, until it reaches Rank 4. You'll see a cutscene involving Ai. From now on you can find Ai at the School Lobby, talk to her, she'll ask you if wanted to skip class with her. (You need a LV 3 Courage in order to skip classes). Accept her request on the next day, she'll ask you to skip classes on lunch break.

dialog.question: Ai: Hmmm, doesn't look like they've gotten anything new in. I already have all of this...
answers: why do you buy so much?

dialog.question: Ai: Buy me an ice latte.
Ai: They should get rid of all salespeople and put in vending machines. Press a button, and out comes your clothes.
Ai: What should we do instead
Ai: Looking at it from your perspective, I'd say you got pretty lucky.
Ai rejected him without a second thought...
Ranking level 3 to 4
The Conversation is getting more and more vulgar...
Ai: Th-thank you for that, last time...
Ai: Do you think maybe I'm his type? O-Or do you think he hates...
Ai: All I need you to do is... ask him what's his type. That's it.
Ai: But if I can't be loved, Then what's the point!?
Ai: It's not like I have any other redeeming qualities...
Ai: Haha, just kidding
Ai: Hmm, do you think we can be a good match? (Only if you chose the second choice)
Ai: I'm sorry. I don't mean to keep making you hang out with me...
Ai: I wonder Why...?
answers: You have a crush on me.

dialog.question: Ai: He was just... a normal, good guy. I guess What I felt was a kind of a fleeting thing.
Things don't look good... You feel Ai is in danger.
Ai: Uh... Sorry, was that unnecessary?
What will you do?
Ai: Hey, why don't you pick out some clothes for me? What do you think I'd look good in?
Ai: Isn't that right, Main Character?
Ai: ...Do you think I'm pretty?
Ai:  Main Character... Do you love me?
Ai:  You need me, right?
answers: Do I really have to say it? (Repeat Question)

dialog.question: Ai: I think we need to... break up.
Ai: I'm so worthless...
Ai: I'm sure you'll eventually hate me... and then you'll leave me.
Ai: Is there any way... that we could just be friends?
Ai: Still... I'm not good at being alone. I know it's a lot to ask, but... will you stay by my side?

sun.name: Cultural Club
sun.notes: The Sun Social Link, is one of the few Social Links that is available on raining days, so take advantage of that time period to rank it up.
rank: Starting from April 25, You can join either the Drama club or the Music Club. If you join the Drama Club, Yumi Ozawa will be your official Sun Arcana Social Link and if you join the Music Club then its Ayane Matsugana.

dialog.question: The line began...
answers: What tempts me is not... (Goes to Question 3)
What craze me is not...  (Goes to Question 2)
What taunts me is not... (Goes to Question 3)

dialog.question: Then it went...
Yumi: ...But i do want us to take it seriously, so give it a shot okay?
Yumi: Huh...? Oh, er...what should i do? We're Still..
answers: Want me to come with you?

dialog.question: Yumi: Wh-When did you get here!? Were you listening to me?
Yumi is trembling with anger...
Yumi: ...Was I wrong when I said that?
answers: It was how you said it.

dialog.question: Yumi: ...Anywhere but at home.
Yumi: Just forget about this, okay?
Yumi: Main Character-kun... Why are you...?
Yumi: She's pushing herself too far. She's so stupid.
Yumi: It's all because of my parents. They're both holding me back.
Yumi: It's not like you have anything do with what's happening in my life.
Yumi: ... I just came from Dad's--that man's room...
answers: Did you make up with him?
Are you taking care of him?

dialog.question: Yumi: ...Why do i have to go through all of this? Why me!?
Yumi: ... He's so stupid
Yumi: There's.... just somethings i just don't understand.
Yumi is not doing good.
Yumi seems to be enduring the tragedy.
Yumi: I am good at something... But what of kind of thing?
answers: The things that can be done.

dialog.question: Yumi: I'll turn around, so if you're going to reject me, just leave the room. That way, I won't have to see you go...
Yumi: Picturing it... It's kind of embarrassing, huh? (If you picked the first choice earlier.)
Ayane: I wish I had as much talent as you.
answers: You do have talent.(Requires Understanding Lv ?)

dialog.question: Cleanup looks like a big task for just one person...
Ayane: I think I'll stick around and practice. I was out so long , I didn't even touch my trombone.
Ayane: ...Not that I'll be in it, but still...
Ayane: Because there are lots of other things I can do for the club. Scheduling, accounting, cleaning up...
Ayane: Shoot... I still can't play the part I was messing up last time.
answers: Why don't you give up?(Requires Lv 3 Courage)+3

dialog.question: Ayane: It'd be nice to be able to play outside, but I'd embarrass myself if I went alone...
answers: Want me to help out? (Requires Understanding, Expression UP)
Alright, follow me. (Requires Courage, Expression UP)

dialog.question: Ayane: Oh... I'm distracting you from your own practice, aren't I...
As the others leave, Ayane stays engrossed in her practice...
Ayane: I can't... I can't do it...
answers: Don't worry, you can do it.(Expression Up)
But who else is there?  (Courage UP)
Its okay to mess up. (Requires Lv 3 Understanding)

dialog.question: The other members are remaining silent...
Ayane is weeping...
What should you do...?
answers: Reveal youir feelings for her. (Lovers Relationship)

dialog.question: Ayane looks at the ground nervously.
answers: wanna go out and have fun?
Wanna come to my house? (Requires Courage Lv ?)

judgement.name: Seekers of Truth
judgement.notes: The Judgement Social Link progresses automatically as you complete the Normal Ending Path
rank: Automatic on December 3rd

rank.notes: Automatic on completion of Magatsu Inaba
Automatic on completion of Magatsu Inaba

aeon.name: Marie
rank: Starting on April 18th, vist the Velvet Room. If event does not trigger, re-enter the Velvet Room.

rank.notes: All Choices have the same effect.

dialog.question: Marie: Hey, What do you do in the city?
Yukiko: Chie, they might already have plans of thier own. Don't just assume
Chie is holding a green shirt...
Yukiko has a crimsom skirt in her hands...
Chie: Why don't we all go together, then? The four of us.
Chie: Well... I don't really know. The meaning of friendship...? Hmmm...
answers: You'll know once you have one.

dialog.question: Marie: Huh? Me too?
Marie: You don't get tired of it?
Yosuke: What are you guys doing? Out on a stroll?
Marie: I don't get it. Do Green and Red do that, too?
Marie: Face yourself...

rank.rank: Rank 5 (Cannot Start until Rise is in your party, July 24 and after.)
rank.notes: All Choices have the same effect.

dialog.question: Marie: So, about my memories... What do you think I should do?
Marie: ...Will this help?
What store around here might deal in old combs like that...?
Rise: Huh? Wait... Don't tell me the two of you are on a date...
Kanji: So, what do you want from me? You need me to figure out where this
Marie grimaces...

rank.notes: All Choices have the same effect.
All Choices have the same effect.

dialog.question: Marie: I had fun then. Take me there again sometimes, okay?
Marie: Hey, can we make more? More memories...
Marie: ...Why?
Marie: ...I won't beleive just words.
Marie is looking around your room...
Marie: Memories so fun, I won't care about the past anymore.
answers: Lots of memories won't do it.

dialog.question: Marie: ...I wouldn't have been able to do that on my own. I only realized that because of you.

jester.name: Tohru Adachi
jester.notes: Depending on the rank, Adachi can only be advanced during certain times of the day.
rank: Starting on May 13th, visit Junes and speak to Adachi, then pick the choice"Hang out with Adachi."

dialog.question: Adachi: I live alone, so taking care of dinner can be pretty tedious.
Adachi doesn't seem to lead a nutritionally balanced life...
answers: Want me to make you dinner?

dialog.question: Adachi: And she'll talk your ear off if you let her...It's so annoying.
Adachi: Oh, uh, sorry for using you like that. You were a big help.
answers: Why don't you come over for real?

dialog.question: Adachi: But Dojima-san's still at work, right? Does that mean it'll be just us? Isn't that weird?
Adachi: When I was in high school, I never gave cooking a single thought.
answers: What kind of student were you?

dialog.question: Adachi: But that works out when you're a student.
Adachi: I bet Dojima-san tells you all the time what a great help you are!
Nanako: Wow! you're the best, Adachi-san!
Adachi: Don't worry about that. We have to be efficient here.
answers: She won't learn anything that way.
Is that how you do your job, too?

dialog.question: Adachi: What about you? Don't you have anything you want me to draw	a flower on?
Adachi: Eeesh. That's certainly going to put a damper on her choices.
Adachi: But I guess that's what it's like for a high schooler. Enjoy it	while you can.
Adachi: But as long as he's here, I don't have to talk to her, so thats a relief.
Adachi: I like being alone. It's easy, and it lets me do whatever I want.

rank.notes: True Ending Path, read the letter. Jester Arcana transform to Lust.
